fr.upmc.components.ports

Interface DataTwoWayPortI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentImplementedI, DataTwoWayI.PullI, DataTwoWayI.PushI, InboundPortI, OfferedI, OutboundPortI, PortI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredI, TwoWayI, TwoWayPortI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTwoWayPort

    public interface DataTwoWayPortI
extends TwoWayPortI, DataTwoWayI.PullI, DataTwoWayI.PushI
    The interface DataTwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for exchanging data among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.

    Description

    Created on : 2012-01-23

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
